p: Treatment with (-)-fenchone (150 mg/kg, p.o.) showed no significant reduction in intestinal fluid accumulation (0.53 ± 0.04) when compared to the control group (0.51 g ± 0.01), treatment with loperamide (5 mg/kg, p.o) reduced the weight of intestinal fluid (0.28 ± 0.01 g) significantly when compared to the control group (Figure 6).
